sample_docs: Home Team Product & Services Technology Ag Land Eval PDF CONTACT US NEWSROOM Corporate Report Example Individual Report Example Client Portal Ag Land Eval PDF N-Sense Apps for N-Sense App Effective Date: 11/01/2023 1. Introduction N-Sense is committed to protecting your privacy and the security of your personal information. This outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of data we receive from users of our mobile & desktop applications. By using the App, you agree to the and practices described in this . 2. Information We Collect 2.1 Personal Information - When you use our App, we may collect personal information that you provide directly, including but not limited to: - Name - Email address - Phone number - We collect this information for the purpose of account verification and login. 2.2 Non-Personal Information - We may also collect non-personal information such as: - GPS Locations (field/sample sites) - Device information - Usage statistics - User interactions within the App 2.3 Ownership Of Data - We may collect field data including, but not limited to: - Measured soil data - Topographic data - Fertilizer prescriptions - Soil Survey data - We may use this data for: - Generating fertilizer prescriptions - Maps of soil properties - Algorithm improvement - Analyze Geospatial patterns - Improve our services 3. How We Use Your Information We may use your information for the following purposes: - To verify your account and facilitate login. - To provide, maintain, and improve our services. - To send you updates and notifications about the App. - To monitor and analyze usage patterns within the App. 4. Data Security We take reasonable measures to protect the security and confidentiality of your information. However, please be aware that no method of data transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data. 5. Disclosure of Information We may share your information with third parties only under the following circumstances: - With your consent. - To comply with legal obligations. - To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property, and that of our affiliates, customers, or the public. 6. Subscription/Payments Payments for use of N-Sense software will go through a third party (Stripe) - https://stripe.com/privacy N-Sense does not collect or store credit card information. 7. Your Choices You have the right to: - Review and update your personal information. - Opt-out of receiving promotional communications. - Delete your account and account information. 8. Changes to this We may update this to reflect changes in our practices and services. We encourage you to review this periodically to stay informed about how we collect, use, and protect your data. 9. Contact Us If you have questions or concerns about our or practices, please contact us at https://n-sense.us/contact-us. By using N-Sense Apps, you agree to the outlined in this . If you do not agree with our practices, please do not use the App. Download Apps N-Sense Apps for N-Sense App N-Sense is committed to protecting your privacy and the security of your personal information.
